game.name: Fantasy World Simulator
game.shortDescription: Open a Pixie shop and dive into an adventure with whimsical creatures. Tame, train, and evolve Pixie characters, then explore the vibrant city with them. Manage your shop, serve customers, and grow your business. Join now and create your own Pixie legend!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open a Pixie shop and dive into an adventure with whimsical creatures. Tame, train, and evolve Pixie characters, then explore the vibrant city with them. Manage your shop, serve customers, and grow your business. Join now and create your own Pixie legend!
